snippet: The World Health Organization issued recommendations for naming infectious diseases, concerned about stigmas of names like swine flu and monkeypox.
abstract: World Health Organization releases guidelines for naming diseases, which address concerns about stigmas and misconceptions such names can create about people, animals and regions.
lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization issued recommendations for naming infectious diseases, concerned about stigmas of names like swine flu and monkeypox.

headline.main: W.H.O. Urges More Care in Naming Diseases
